Posts.Content: Glitterbuns wrote: So you can read my back post if you like.  I finally had MRI, still having pain, and have had new symptoms like my lymph under my arm and in my neck swelling up and then going back down over a few days.   Anyway, what are the chances of a negative MRI, ductogram, ultrasound AND mammogram?   I'm meeting with the surgeon tomorrow, but feeling awfully stupid and like I'm making vapors of nothing since they can't find anything.  Oh, discharge is also still there and actually worse, now I have tan (was bloody) fluid coming from one duct, and clear from another.  What the heck else could be wrong?   My husband said he thinks maybe I have endometrosis in my breast.  I do have endo in my pelvis and they actually found some on my appendix scar when I was a laperoscopy.   Feeling so frustrated!  I don't want it to be cancer, but I don't like hearing we don't know either :(.   I will update tomorrow or ughh I guess whenever I find out something new.  Glitter Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Well ...what the freak .. ughh Glitterbuns dlb823

Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2013 01:53AM Glitterbuns wrote: Thanks leaf.  I forgot to update.   I left the surgeon office (2nd opinion already) an awful mess.   She basically did a physical exam and then said she didn't think I need surgery yet or anything.  I showed her the discharge and she seemed very unconcerned because it took me a few seconds to express it.  The problem is it comes out on it's own when it wants too, and I try not to mess with it because that is what they told me to do.  She told me to try evening primrose oil and vit E and come back in 3 months if still having an issue.  I am so upset, because if I wait three more months that is from beginning of February to July having this issue.   I'm still having lots of pain in the breast area, and in my arm and near my neck area.   I guess I'm going to try the primrose crap and then go back to my PCP in a week or two?  I don't really know what else to do.   Oh, she did recommend genetic testing, although that is really stupid because as my sisters onocologist said they can only test limited things, it is basically a waste.   Glitter
Posts.Title: Well ...what the freak .. ughh Glitterbuns dlb823
